title: Circus In The Sky
body:
[C] All I see is dark and clear
[C] All I feel is here and real

[Am] And when I’m wide awake [F]
[Am] I see all my mistakes [F]
[Am] And all the bones I break [F]
[Am] The world hears me say [F]

My [C] sky,  [Am]
[F] Circus in [C] my [Am] sky
My [C] sky,  [Am]
[F] Circus in [C] my [Am] sky
[C] You and [Am] I

The [C] stars in your [Am] eyes
Shine [C] bright to [Am] me
You’re [C] all i [Am] need

[C] This is [F] not the [Am] end
[C] We’re [F]  on the [Am] edge

[Am] Me and [C] You, 
Well [G] get [F] this [Am] through
[Am] On our [C] way, 
This [G] is [F] our [Am] way 

[Am] Me and [C] You, 
Well [G] get [F] this [Am] through
[Am] On our [C] way, 
This [G] is [F] our [Am] way 

My [C] sky 
[F][C][Am]
bodyLyrics:
All I see is dark and clear
All I feel is here and real

And when I’m wide awake 
I see all my mistakes 
And all the bones I break 
The world hears me say 

My sky, 
Circus in my sky
My sky, 
Circus in my sky
You and I

The stars in your eyes
Shine bright to me
You’re all i need

This is not the end
We’re on the edge

Me and You, 
Well get this through
On our way, 
This is our way 

Me and You, 
Well get this through
On our way, 
This is our way 

My sky
